page.title: 13PAUL AND MRS. HERRING'S DAY
page.content: I get up at 7.45am and have eggs and bacon for breakfast. I then pack my school bag and my mum gets ready for work. My mother drives me to school, which is only about half a mile away. Sometimes we stop at the local shop to buy some sweets. Then I walk around to the school playground at about 8.45am and school starts at 9.00am. My mother drives to work in Nevill Hall Hospital Abergavenny which is about six miles away. She works as a secretary for Dr.Jones a consultant. She goes into the foyer and then catches the lift up to the third floor. In her office she has a coffee and then puts on her earphones and starts typing from her dictating machine. {(continued on page 14) {
